Answer: iron ore smelting; the bow and arrow; the long spear (South of the Sahara) ; hieroglyphics, pyramids (Egypt) steam driven toys ( Alexandria), and if you include Timbuctoo in north Africa, then archiving. There must be more but then I was not schooled in the 1990s.
